website_summaries.verdict: Unless you're a social networking addict and child of the YouTube era, you won't find much use for the FinePix Z30. The novel aspects don't make up for the clunky buttons, slow performance and noisy images at all.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little camera Whirl White design
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my kid for Christmas about 3 years ago and she still uses it whenever we go camping, vacation, visits, etc. Compact, convenient, hooks up easily to the computer and it is very attractive. As an adult, I would not mind carrying this around in my purse. The video quality and photos are not bad at all. We have compared identical shots taken with her camera and my more expensive (older too) camera and the colors seem more vibrant with her camera. Very pleased with this little camera and we paid a lot less back than what is advertised at now.
customer_reviews.author: Freelance

customer_reviews.title: Grainy Photos
customer_reviews.text: I admit this camera is cheap, small, portable, and relatively easy to use, but the quality of the photos are terrible. So terrible, that I bought a new camera and this one just sits in my room. That's how bad it is. It's such a waste of a $~70 camera. I didn't want to miss out on once-in-a-lifetime photos while I was in Europe, so I didn't even take this camera. It's not a 50/50 chance as one reviewer said. For me, it's a 95% chance that the photo will turn out terrible. I'm not willing to ruin great photo ops with a cheap, poor-performing camera. I wish I hadn't bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good design but pictures are worthless
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom for christmas. I charged it and tested it for her and I feel bad about giving this to her. It takes the most grainy pictures I have ever seen on a digital camera and I have owned about 5 over the years. I thought technology was supposed to get better not worse? Don't pay attention to the megapixel claim it is just a marketing gimmick, my old 3.2 megapixel digital camera took better photos than this. I am returning to Amazon for a refund and I am going to buy her a better camera. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Greenwood

customer_reviews.title: Great for my kids - quality and lots of fun features
customer_reviews.text: My kids got this for christmas -9 and 11 yrs old and love it. It has music to go with the pics and slideshow. Of course they didn't need to read the directions, they just "got it." I was very impressed. My daughters camera seems to be once in a while not want to go on so she has to close the lens for awhile again or push the battery in. I don't know if it's her or the camera yet. But it has been a great gift compared to junk that will get thrown out anyway. And now I get to be in the pictures!
customer_reviews.author: Numba

customer_reviews.title: Great design. It works great in the day and ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought the whirl white camera years ago when it was still cheap. Great design. It works great in the day and not bad at night. The zoom is amazing. After zooming in, the quality is not bad. Great use for concerts. Dropped it so many times but it still worked fine afterwards. Extremely sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: its awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: the camera is great! its practically identical to the newest edition of the fujifilm finepix cameras. even has all the same apps and LCD width. its a terrific camera and, personally, i love the designs. some people say it looks childish, but i disagree: its stylish. no one (but my sister who has a similar one) has my camera! and the rubber buttons (or whatever material they are) are much better to feel than the hard buttons of other cameras. it may not be the ideal camera for a pro-photographer, but it suits my needs. i usually only take pictures at family dinners,birthdays,outings with friends, and the usual things like that in life.
customer_reviews.author: Alessandra

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: We got this camera after our Kodak got sand in the lens mechanism and would not open. We paid around $110 and feel as though this is a great value for a high quality and easy to operate camera. The actual product is more high quality in look and feel than the pictures give it justice (looks like a toy in the pictures) and the flip open lens cover to turn the unit on is a nice feature. The battery is also solid in terms of length of use and quickness to charge. Works seemlessly with Picasa too, which is nice. So far we are very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: B. Merolla

customer_reviews.title: Great Point and Shoot Camera!
customer_reviews.text: This camera has takes great quality photos, they print out looking great too! It's not made for professional photography purposes, but it is ideal for every day use. It has several shooting modes to choose from, there's an energy preservation selection, and face detection. On the battery, I've found that if you actually charge the battery like you're supposed to(charge it before your initial use, and only charge it when it needs to be charged), it lasts! I purchased an additional battery so I wouldn't be without one should the situation present itself, it was only $7 on Amazon.com !. Overall, great camera for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 13 year old daughter. She got a, "Nicer," model for Christmas and broke it in 3 days. She loves this camera and hasn't broke it since we got it 4 months ago. The pictures turn out really crisp and she enjoys being able to upload them with no assistance. It is easy to use and offers some great features.
customer_reviews.author: Jlovelace

customer_reviews.title: bought this a year ago
customer_reviews.text: i bought this a year ago and its still working just as good as the day i bought it i use this camera heavily bars concerts car shows in the rain although i don't recommend it getting wet sometimes would shut down ,once dry works fine today its beat up and still going strong ,
customer_reviews.author: jumbo

customer_reviews.title: I Love This Camera!!
customer_reviews.text: When i puchased this camera, i bought it for a Valentine's Day Special. So i basically paid $80.00 for my camera. Now i see the actual retail price and i can see why it is just that. This camera is very nice and looks better in person. I love this camera. I would reccommend this for anyone. I recieved my package within 2 days. So this camera comes with great services and a wararanty.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is an easy to use camera, and it takes great pictures! It required minimal set up, and was ready to use right out of the box. We have had no problems with this camera. The pictures upload easily, and the battery charges quickly. It is practically fool-proof! A great camera for the price!
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: what a bargain!
customer_reviews.text: not sure what its selling for now, but at $70 delivered i bought two, one for each daughter. the white with 60's striping is not my bag, but hey, for the money, who cares and the kids like it. its way too feature packed to describe it all here, but man, what a great value.
customer_reviews.author: soflokid

customer_reviews.title: FujiFilm FinePix
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera. Bought this camera for my Mother, who broke her panasonic camera. She's older and this Fuji has a nice big LCD. I can't comment on the battery life, but for how often my folks will use it...I'm sure it will be fine. For under $100, this is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: D. Thornton

customer_reviews.title: BEST CAMERA I HAVE EVER OWNED (and I've owned a lot)
customer_reviews.text: This Fuji camera has been the best camera I have ever owned.. Sure its only 10 mp and sure it doesn't have the best zoom. But the pictures are clear, beautiful, crisp, and full of color.. A lot of people complain about the flash on this camera but the flash ALWAYS delivers whether in bright or low light settings. One of my favorite things about this fuji camera is that it gives the subject of the picture a GREAT skin tone.. I have had too many cameras make family pictures look too pink or yellow, this is just right. This is the second of the same camera I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: Megan H

customer_reviews.title: A couple of years old already
customer_reviews.text: This turned out to be a VERY GOOD choice with so many features...yet easy to use. I took a chance because I had read some negative reviews.....it was 'too cute' for one reviewer.
customer_reviews.author: UtahRecluse

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera for my daughter for Christmas. She has 3 children, ages 16, 4, & 1. Now I get more photos of the grandchildren. She loves it. Says it is easier to carry around with her and takes great photos.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: The item failed to work after a few weeks of use. I returned it to Amazon for a refund. I did not look into the warranty. I don't want to use a product if it fails in the first 30 days.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Law

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my 4 and a half year old grandson. He mastered the basics within minutes. After an hour he was taking pictures, making short videos, setting the timer and posing in pictures with family members, viewing and deleting. Makes much better sense than the "plastic for little kids cameras". They are not cheap, only use dbl A batteries and do not have quality results. The battery life is good. He downloads to his mom's mac and she can plug in the battery to recharge when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Baba

customer_reviews.title: Takes great pics!
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my sister since I thought I was purchasing a water proof version. Takes great pics!
customer_reviews.author: Tami L. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this camera to replace my Nikon Coolpix. I hated my Coolpix, so when I saw the reviews for this camera, and the price, I figured I couldn't go wrong! Takes great pictures and videos, the battery life is fantastic, and the viewer screen is phenominal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera for the Cost
customer_reviews.text: I like the easy functioning of the camera. The only glitch I had was loading the software on my laptop. The cd that comes with the camera only had software compatibility up to Windows Vista and of course, I would have Windows 7. It was remedied by going onto Fuji's website, pulling up the link for updating the software to Windows 7, installing it and everything has been working fine ever since.
customer_reviews.author: The Preventer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, but now is too expensive
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item a few months ago, but I'm impress how much has raise it price I bought it at 69.99 including shipping, Why is so expensive now that I want to buy another?
customer_reviews.author: Marcus S

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for 89.99
customer_reviews.text: Bought the White One when it was first released about a week and a half ago, For the price its actually a pretty nice camera but, kind of unreliable on the photos it takes some come out ok and some don't. Some of the photos had bubbles in them. Over all its a ok basic point and shoot camera but I will be returning mine tomorrow, not really what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: H. Gress

customer_reviews.title: fuji pink
customer_reviews.text: This camera is of pretty good quality & actually did better than I thought it would... I should have gotten two because I did get a pretty good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha L

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my wife for Christmas. She loves the compact size and easy to use features. The camera feels solid and is very responsive. Only negative I've noticed is that the quality of pictures in low light is lacking somewhat. Keep your subjects close in low light and it will be OK.
customer_reviews.author: Traveler76

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Camera
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure it's a great camera, I gave it to my niece for Christmas and she was ALL about it! The only beef I had with the camera is that it was not new as the description implied. It was used, opened, with greasy fingerprints all over it and photos still on the hard drive that I erased. Other than purchasing it from a crappy company, the camera works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, great value, great features AND easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I have looked a Fujifilm cameras for 2 years now and decided to take the plunge. I love this camera. It is eons ahead of Kodak and even the popular Nikon in the same class. Both of which I already own. The low light pictures are great! One of my frustrations with the above mention brands was that I couldn't take clear pictures of my childs performances(inside a dim gymnasium) I missed so many great shots. This camera makes it happen!! Wow! Don't second guess, just pick out your favorite color and go for it! A great deal for the $$$ too!
customer_reviews.author: N. Douglas

customer_reviews.title: fujiifilm finepix-good buy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera about a month ago and I have taken approximately 100 pictures. the pic quality is good. the camera is very easy to use. it has a fast recovery time and has a continuous mode that is good for taking taking a series of pics. very good battery life. All in all a good cheap point and shoot camera.
customer_reviews.author: R. White

customer_reviews.title: I love my camera
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it because of it simplicity and way to control the kind of picture you wanna take. I really love my camera. The pictures are perfect and have an amazing quality by its price its great too. Its a total girly adolescent digital camera, I'm 21 but to me its great because I don't want more buttons than the one I'm going to use. Totally what I was expecting and loved the White one.
customer_reviews.author: S. Arcelay

customer_reviews.title: Love this little camera!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera because my SLR camera is too big to carry when going on certain trips. This camera is great because I can stick it in my purse. It has so many functions and is very easy to use. I was very surprised as I didn't expect too much from it but it holds it's own against my SLR and the price was much less.
customer_reviews.author: EileenJ

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson's birthday. What lead me to this were the colors available. His favorite is orange. Went to a local superstore to check it out. It seems to have everything an 8-year old could need, ie: ease of use, batteries, large viewing screen.
customer_reviews.author: Burlington

customer_reviews.title: Good but could be better
customer_reviews.text: Hi! I recently purchased the camera and I can tell you that the product is good for the price that you are paying. There are some things that aren't as good as I'd want to, like the night pictures and the time it takes to shoot. Anyway, if you need a simple, nice and not advanced machine, I believe this one is just ok.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Casadiego P

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera because of it's small size. It is easy to carry in my purse or in my pocket. It doesn't take the best quality pictures, but it's not bad. It's easy to use and easy to load the pictures onto my computer. Overall, it's a good camera for the price.
customer_reviews.author: CaitM

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Fun!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this camera. It is super cute and compact. I bought it because I needed something small to keep in my purse. Fuji has never disappointed! This will be my 4th Fuji camera and I will never use another brand... The pictures are clear and sharp, there are a ton of different features. Have fun!
customer_reviews.author: Steff

customer_reviews.title: Grainy
customer_reviews.text: Grainy pictures and grainy video even in bright light. I have had it for over a year now and I wish I had bought something else.
customer_reviews.author: teds

customer_reviews.title: SUPER LITTLE CAMERA!
customer_reviews.text: I PURCHASED THIS CAMERA AS A GIFT FOR MY WIFE. SHE LIKES IT, BUT I LOVE IT!!! I USE IT MORE THAN SHE DOES. IT TAKES SUPER PICTURES, BUT THE VIDEOS ARE A LITTLE SHAKEY. THAT'S OKAY, CAUSE I BOUGHT IT AS A STILL CAMERA, NOT A VIDEO!! LOTS MORE FEATURES THAN I FIGURED IT WOULD HAVE FOR THE PRICE. CANT BE BEAT!!!
customer_reviews.author: GARY SCOTT

customer_reviews.title: Great little Fuji
customer_reviews.text: This cute, compact camera is super easy to use and the pictures turn out great. It was hard to tell from seeing the shots on the lcd screen, but once loaded onto the computer, I was pretty impressed. I got this for a super deal on Amazon.com and it was well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha T. Fogle

customer_reviews.title: fuji z30
customer_reviews.text: awesome camera. turns on instantly so we can catch the kids being goofy before the spot us. bought an extra battery but it just sits on the chareger, the one that comes with it lasts forever. great camera.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny L. Scott

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP AND GOOD, ITS WORTH IT!
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT THIS CAMARA 2 WEEKS AGO FOR MYSELF, AND I DO NOT REGRET IT. IT TAKES PERFECT PICTURES AND IT HAS ALOT OF PICTURE ADJUSTMENTS. THE ONLY DOWNFALL IS THAT IT IS VERY SMALL, BUT IS SO SMALL THAT ITS CUTE AND MAKES IT DIFFERENT AND UNIQUE FROM THE OTHERS. I BUY ALOT OF AMAZON PRODUCTS AND THIS IS THE BEST PRODUCT I BOUGHT YET. GOOD LUCK I HOPE MY REVIEW HAS HELPED YOU. I FORGOT TO ALSO ADD THE SOFTWARE IS EASY TO INSTALL AND ITS EASY TO UNDERSTAND. GOOD LUCK GUYS I HOPE YOU BUY THIS PRODUCT. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Mrs France

customer_reviews.title: Faultless fujiZ series
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it says it does, looks great too.Nice & compact for nights out & holidays as all the Z series are im on my 3rd upgrade now can't fault them @ all, highly recommend for people who just want a no nonsense point & take photo camera.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. F. Eveleigh

customer_reviews.title: great choice
customer_reviews.text: I searched for a great, cheap and easy to use point and shoot camera. This camera is awesome, very easy to use, I even bought one for my mother in law!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Chinchilla Guillen

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this little camera for my 5 yrs old granddaughter. It is so easy to use, and she loves it. Takes great pics. I would purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Hazel O'rourke

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: We have found this camera easier to use, better pictures, and smaller for easier carrying on vacation than the newer models.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry A. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Fuji review
customer_reviews.text: This is the best buy I have made so far. This nice sleek camera has done more than I could have imagined. Fits in the smallest purses and you still have room for your personal items. LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.author: E. Antuna

customer_reviews.title: Great value camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. It is small and stylish. It also takes really good pictures!! The only downside is that the screen is a bit grainy, but this does not affect the pictures at all! Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Yorktown

customer_reviews.title: Novelty
customer_reviews.text: It's an ok first camera for a child who doesn't have a cell phone yet. It does take decent pictures and the design is different so it makes it attractive to children. Would suggest also purchasing the carrying case that goes with it.
customer_reviews.author: KarenR

customer_reviews.title: Fuji camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera looked so much better in person than it did in the picture. The picture are good and it is easy to operate. It was bought for a teenager so it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Dragonfly Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Camera!
customer_reviews.text: Camera is very easy to operate. My daughter loves the fact that it fits right in her pocket. Battery does not last a very long time, but is easily charged.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Hamlett

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely one of the better vendors. A+ shopping experience; top quality product; super fast service. I would recommend them without reservation.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely love this camera. I got it for her for Christmas and she takes it everywhere. Its auto focus and clear pics are wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Doris J. Haygood

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent camera for the value. I bought it for mi wife and she is very happy with it. The color of the pictures is very bright, and the panel in the back is bigger than most cameras. It is not PLASTIC, like the cameras in the same range value, so the battery and memory holder will last for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Colmenares

customer_reviews.title: continuing solid service from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was quick and arrived in time for Christmas as promised. Packaging was intact and appropriate. Everything I expect when I order from Amazon. Product worked right out of the box and was a perfect Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: E Hobgood

customer_reviews.title: good camera
customer_reviews.text: for the price i felt this camera has the best quality my neice deserves thankyou.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Moore II

customer_reviews.title: fun little toy
customer_reviews.text: I love the compact size with the huge view finder. very easy to use. fits well in purse or pocket
customer_reviews.author: Robin Doronn

customer_reviews.title: The fujifilm z30 on the first day
customer_reviews.text: I just received my camera yesterday and it will not turn on. I tried both batteries that came with the bundle and it still will not turn on. I'm going to return this one and upgrade to either a canon or nikon. The fujifilm looks alright but seems to be cheaply made. Even if it did turn on, I dont think this camera would last very long.
customer_reviews.author: Owen Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Cost Effective
customer_reviews.text: Got what I paid for. Pros: Cheap Cons: Not so good in terms of quality. Others: For the price, I got this. That's more than enough :)
customer_reviews.author: T. Htoon

customer_reviews.title: Just how you described it.
customer_reviews.text: This product was packeged and delivered successfully. It performs extremely precise to the standards it was given by the seller. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gaona

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with camera
customer_reviews.text: I have had this camera since the end of Aug. Love it, no problems. Nice pictures !
customer_reviews.author: Linda Deveso

customer_reviews.title: Fuji Camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is not worth the $149 retail value that it claimed, less than half the value. This was no bargain. I will not be trusting or ordering items from you again.
customer_reviews.author: Toni R. Radmann

customer_reviews.title: Dont Buy...Terrible!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Don't believe the reviews, this camera stinks bad. Very grainy, terrible quality. No zoom during video also.
customer_reviews.author: cbernardo

product_meta.title: Fujifilm FinePix Z30 10MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom (Pink)
product_meta.description:
Color:PinkFROM THE MANUFACTURER


Boasting a high-resolution 2.7-inch LCD screen, the 10-megapixel FinePix Z30 has a Fujinon 3x optical zoom lens and is designed for ultra-portability, making this the ideal camera for the fashionista on-the-go. Like its predecessor, the Fujifilm Z20, the Fujifilm Z30 can Face it, Blog it and Roll it. Users can Face It with Fujifilm's innovative Face Detection Technology with Automatic Red Eye Removal for capturing the ultimate group shots; Blog it with the innovative Blog Mode, making it effortless for social-media-savvy users to post pictures and videos to personal profile pages, blogs and video sharing websites or simply to e-mail to friends; and Roll it with the Successive Movie mode that allows users to create 60 second movie clips. 

Automatic Scene Recognition
SR Auto (Automatic Scene Recognition) enables the FinePix Z30 to intelligently recognize six types of scenes automatically. For each picture taken in this mode, the Z30 will optimize the ideal exposure, focus, white balance and ISO for the scene to ensure the best quality picture is captured with ease. 

The FinePix Z30 is also packed with the following features:

 * Natural Light & with Flash Mode: In this mode, the FinePix Z30 quickly shoots two images in succession -- one with and one without the flash -- saving both. This convenient function lets the user perform an on-the-spot picture comparison and decide whether the FinePix Z30fd produced the most pleasing photo with flash, or without. 
 * Successive Movie Mode: In-camera editing allows for the creation of a 60-second movie clip, even when shooting in two or more scenes is desired. Start and restart multiple times to build a 60-second compilation, and edit the start and end points. 
 * Dual Shutter Releases: One button for still capture, one for movie record, for ease of use. 
 * Special Scene Modes: The FinePix Z30fd has 13 scene positions including Fireworks, Beach and Snow, offering a one-touch setting for almost any situation. 
 * SD/SD-HC Compatible slot: A single media slot that accepts SD/SD-HC media cards. 
 * Battery Life: Long-life rechargeable Li-ion battery.
feature_bullets: 10.0-megapixel resolution for large, photo quality prints
3x optical zoom; 2.7-inch LCD screen with Micro Thumbnail View
Face Detection, Red-eye Removal and easy-to-use Blog mode
50 MB built-in memory; capture images to SD/SDHC memory cards (not included)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars121 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
